name: whiteboard
description: A whiteboard app to replace a lost one

scripts.start: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider cp -a config.local.js ./src/app/config.js; webpack serve --config webpack.dev.js --open
scripts.build-dev: cp -a config.development.js ./src/app/config.js; rm -r dist; mkdir -p dist/ui; webpack --config webpack.prod.js; mv dist/ ui; mkdir dist; mv ui dist/; cp -a app-lan-engbrd-com.conf dist/;
scripts.build: cp -a config.production.js ./src/app/config.js; rm -r dist; mkdir -p dist/ui; webpack --config webpack.prod.js; mv dist/ ui; mkdir dist; mv ui dist/; cp -a     app-engbrd-com.conf dist/;
scripts.setup-dev: npm run build-dev; gnoDeploy setup    app-lan-engbrd-com aine      dist/ 18.18.0
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev; gnoDeploy deploy   app-lan-engbrd-com aine      dist/ 18.18.0
scripts.setup: npm run build;     gnoDeploy setup  app-engbrd-com azure-main dist/ 18.18.0
scripts.deploy: npm run build;     gnoDeploy deploy app-engbrd-com azure-main dist/ 18.18.0

author: Brandon OToole
